entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Fog patches. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
